text: Les Assassins du dimanche () is a French drama film from 1956, directed by Alex Joffé, written by Alex Joffé , starring Barbara Laage. == Cast == * Barbara Laage : Simone Simonet * Dominique Wilms : Ginette Garcet * Jean-Marc Thibault : Robert Simonet * Paul Frankeur : Lucien Simonet * Georges Poujouly : Julot * Paul Préboist ==References== == External links == * Category:French films Category:French-language films Category:French black-and-white films
title: Les Assassins du dimanche
